original_text: I will set his hand also in the sea, and his right hand in the rivers.
korean_text: 내가 또 그의 손을 바다 위에 놓으며 오른손을 강들 위에 놓으리니

sentences.original_text: I will set his hand also in the sea
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 또한 그의 손을 바다에 두겠고

sentences.original_text: and his right hand in the rivers
